analyzed: bos g.yeng ba rnam shes lnga/_/phyi rol yul lngar 'pho bas g.yeng /_/bying rgod

analyzed: snyoms 'jug pa/_/gnas ngan len par the tshhom med/_/dran 'byung rjes su

analyzed: gtan bzhi/_/snyoms 'jug bzhir gol sa dgu ste/_/ther zug chad pa'i phyin

analyzed: ci log_/bya ba mang la 'byung skyen zhing /_/ngang thung 'khrug dang du bshad thos//

analyzed: tshhe dur kun nya slang gnyid/_/skam chags tshhong sems spre spyod rkyen/_/de ltar

analyzed: med pas/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur nas/_/mtshhan ma mnyam pa'i

analyzed: dbyings su gnas/_/dgag dang bsgrub pa gang  la yin/_/cung zad khams

analyzed: kyi cha nyams pa/_/mi gsal mthong dang mi 'jug rtshogs/_/zin nas spyod lam

translated: In this way, the demon of laxity will be destroyed, and the demon of excitement will be subdued.🔽The five stages are: the initial stage, the stage of increase, the stage of stability, the stage of culmination, and the stage of final training.🔽The person who is like a frog in a well,🔽who is accustomed to a small vessel,

analyzed: mu lngas  yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/gang zag gzar po'i chu gnas tshhe/_/ kun rtags goms pa'i rdza mkhan gyis/_/mi sdod 'gro bas skyo bar byed/_/de
translated: will be discouraged by the immensity of the ocean.🔽In the same way, those who have a little virtue🔽and are accustomed to a small amount of virtue🔽will be discouraged by the immensity of the virtue of the bodhisattvas.🔽Therefore, one should not be discouraged, but should be like someone whose head is on fire,
